resources.string: Your favorite Dota 2 hero has not been defined yet.

Your favorite Dota 2 hero is:

%s

What a fine choice!
What is your favorite Dota 2 hero?
Saved your favorite hero \'%s\' to device storage
Loaded your favorite Dota 2 hero \'%s\' from device storage

This screen shows an overview of top tournament and ranked matches currently being played, similar to the "Watch" tab in the Dota 2 client.

 Click on a match to show or hide additional information. Swipe left or right on a ranked match to switch between pro players' official name and current Steam name.

 Type "watch_server <Server ID>" into your Dota 2 console and press Enter to start spectating the match in your Dota 2 client.
Need to provide a valid Steam Web API key in res/values/strings.xml!
App needs permission to access the current network state!
App needs permission to connect to the internet!
Network error. Please check your internet connection
\'%s\' is not a valid Dota 2 hero!
